Name: Dutch Word
Ingredients: 20 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist (discarded) & lime wedge on rim.
Review: A genever-based variation to the classic Last Word cocktail .
History: Created in December 2010 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England. Last Word history
Nutrition: One serving of Dutch Word contains 167 calories
